snippet.title: Calyx Demo Official Trailer – a PC strategy game with an overwhelming alien organism. Demo on Steam.
snippet.description: Our PC RTS and base builder with a new kind of enemy, Calyx puts you in charge of a space mining outpost, locked in battle with an overwhelming alien organism. Build your base, gather resources, assemble your forces, and take on the Calyx. With only an out-of-date AI for company, can you survive? Get the Demo on Steam now!
